name: Elgato Stream Deck XL
image_prompt: Elgato Stream Deck XL, 32 LCD keys in grid layout, black frame, customizable button icons visible
description: Ultimate macro controller with 32 customizable LCD keys. Features one-touch actions for streaming, productivity, and smart home. Supports folders, multi-actions, and thousands of integrations.

reviews.review_text: Not just for streaming. Automates my entire dev workflow.
32 keys means I never run out of macros.
Software could be more intuitive but keys are great.
